Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High 6.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Wind light except northwest 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:46 AM PST Tuesday 14 February 2023
